result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rodney Tyler Lowe

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Sentencing Hearing on 8/31/15 by Becky Berhow

CASES: 15CF266, 15CF206, 15CF261 Defendant Rodney Tyler Lowe in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant Rodney Tyler Lowe in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 10:54AM 

15CF206 Ct 1 OWI 10th-  Def plea of G. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. M&D Ct 3, Dismiss outright Ct 2.  DRI all of 15CF261. Dismiss all of 15CF266. 

SENTENCING ON Ct 1 in 15CF206- 12.5 yrs prison- 7.5 IC,  5 EC, elig for SAP, $1,694 fine/cost- taken out of bond and remainder refunded to poster, AODA and comply, 24 rev DL, 24 IID,  cannot possess firearm, cannot vote, DNA sample & $250 surcharge. 11:17am adj.
DE pleads NG - Ct accepts NG plea.

11:15 Defendant Rodney Tyler Lowe in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant Rodney Tyler Lowe in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JP-clerk  Ct receives PH waiver.  Ct questions Mr Lowe.  Ct finds that Mr Lowe's waiver has been made FVK, ct binds over for further proceedings.  ADA Tolan provides information.  JA to schedule.  11:19 adj.
Not to have contact with: Keven Hodge. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Absolute Sobriety.

1:45 Defendant Rodney Tyler Lowe in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JP-clerk  He is represented by S.T. from PD.  Ct sets bond.  Ct quashes warrant.  1:53 adj.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 11:00 am.
